head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BIE, COMNENE, IRENE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BIE, COMNENE, IRENE

block.p: BIE-COMNENE-Irene. January 2, 1998. Beloved wife of the late Rolf Bie and the late Aurelio Corsani. She was the proud daughter of Nicolas Petrescu Comnene. Friends may call on Saturday, January 10, 1998, from 2-5 P.M. and 7-9 P.M. at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street. Service following on Sunday, January 11, 1998, at 3:30 P.M. at Frank E. Campbell.

BIE-COMNENE-Irene. January 2, 1998. Beloved wife of the late Rolf Bie and the late Aurelio Corsani. She was the proud daughter of Nicolas Petrescu Comnene. Friends may call on Saturday, January 10, 1998, from 2-5 P.M. and 7-9 P.M. at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street. Service following on Sunday, January 11, 1998, at 3:30 P.M. at Frank E. Campbell.
